attributes.action: Ban Goverment TV information that use fear tactics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more goverment information adverts are useing fear as its main driver, we have untaxed cars crushed, drink drive with casuaties, obeasity, drunkeness and now climate change with a horror story being read as a bedtime story to a child. the need to educate using fear has almost disappeared from our school  education system and yet its becoming more like everyday useage by this goverment.Frightening people into doing what you want them to do is called bullying, not governing.
